meanings.definition: A synthetic hormone that mimics the effects of progesterone.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed progestins to help regulate my menstrual cycle.
meanings.sent2: Many birth control pills contain progestins to prevent pregnancy.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled progestins all over the lab, and now the mice are acting strangely!
meanings.sent4: Her calming presence was like a dose of progestins in the midst of chaos.
meanings.sent5: The progestins worked like magic, easing her symptoms almost instantly.

meanings.definition: Any of a group of steroid hormones that have progestational activity.
meanings.sent1: Progestins are commonly used in hormone replacement therapy for menopausal women.
meanings.sent2: The body naturally produces progestins during the second half of the menstrual cycle.
meanings.sent3: The progestins in the gym locker room seemed to have a mind of their own, jumping from one bottle to another!
meanings.sent4: His leadership style was like a blend of different progestins, each contributing to the overall success.
meanings.sent5: The progestins in the medication acted as a shield, protecting her from the harsh symptoms.
